resources.string: Draw and share your own themes for HTC Dot View.

HTC Dot Design lets your draw one-of-a-kind themes for your HTC Dot View. Create a drawing from scratch, turn photos into pixelated masterpieces or pick one of HTC\'s templates to get started. After you\'re done designing, show off what you\'ve made with friends and family. You\'ll need the HTC Dot View case and app to get the full experience.
